message: Let's make a deal! This offer benefits us both now.
Alice, my turn. Let's be fairer, this deal ensures we both benefit from a quicker agreement.
Bob, time is running out!  My offer is still generous considering the inflation.
Alice, let's be realistic. This offer still favors you but prevents us from losing more to inflation.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
Alice, this is non-negotiable. A 50/50 split is the only fair option considering the inflation. Don't let greed make us both lose!
